channel.title: Brisbane s calendar Light up Brisbane
channel.description: This calendar includes scheduled lights ups of Council assets including Story Bridge, Reddacliff Place sculptures, Victoria Bridge, Brisbane City Hall, King George Square, William Jolly Bridge and Tropical Dome at Brisbane Botanic Gardens Mt Coot-tha.

item.title: Brisbane International
item.description:
Sunday, 4 January 2026

The Victoria Bridge will be lit Blue with Yellow to celebrate The Brisbane International

The Brisbane International presented by ANZ returns from 4-11 January 2026. The Brisbane International 2026 is set to deliver a full week of elite tennis and vibrant summer energy. With world-class tennis featuring the best players from the ATP and WTA tour and an electric atmosphere at the Queensland Tennis Centre, the summer of tennis begins in Brisbane.

This Light Up is organised by: Brisbane Economic Development Agency



Light up asset: Victoria Bridge, Brisbane City
Venue address: Victoria Bridge, Brisbane City
Venue type: General Council venue, Light up asset
item.xCal:description: The Victoria Bridge will be lit Blue with Yellow to celebrate The Brisbane International The Brisbane International presented by ANZ returns from 4-11 January 2026. The Brisbane International 2026 is set to deliver a full week of elite tennis and vibrant summer energy. With world-class tennis featuring the best players from the ATP and WTA tour and an electric atmosphere at the Queensland Tennis Centre, the summer of tennis begins in Brisbane. This Light Up is organised by: Brisbane Economic Development Agency
